attributes.action: publicly explain the contents of the new european treaty which is being created .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public should be made aware of the contents of the new european treaty and the wall of silence on EU power and jurisdiction should be removed. If the prime minister is so certain that the new european treaty is going to be in the best interests of the UK than the treaty contents should be made public through the media such as national newspapers.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
